english.segment1: Escaping to nowhere, nowhere. You run and find that you are nowhere. Circles in your paths. Streets are empty
english.segment2: You'll find chaotic voices. In your head guiding false. You'll never seem to find your way. Streets dark and empty
english.segment3: Nowhere to trot to. Thoughts of fear in your mind. All alone, nowhere to go. You turn on the radio. To escape your thoughts
english.segment4: Nothing seems to make sense. 'Cause everything is gray. And you'll never find your way. Lost in you own dismay
english.segment5: Running around with your head chopped off. You only last a few seconds. 'Cause you're not. You're not, you're not
